Instruction: In a saucepan, bring vegetable broth to a boil. Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let it stand for 5 minutes.
Fluff the cooked couscous with a fork and transfer it to a large mixing bowl.
Add sliced almonds, sliced green onions, chopped fresh parsley, and white grapes to the couscous.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the couscous mixture and toss gently until well combined.
Serve the white grape and almond couscous at room temperature as a flavorful side dish.
